snippet: The artwork, which Iran said included drawings by Americans, was blocked from export after the 1979 revolution and Tehran hostage crisis.
abstract: Iran and United States confirm 14 pieces of American art bought by Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art in 1978 have finally been delivered to museum; art works were blocked from export due to 1979 revolution and subsequent break in relations between two countries.
lead_paragraph: The artwork, which Iran said included drawings by Americans, was blocked from export after the 1979 revolution and Tehran hostage crisis.

headline.main: U.S. Delivers Art to Iran That Had Been Impounded Since 1979
headline.print_headline: U.S. Delivers Art to Iran Impounded Since 1979
